entities.name: kitchen
entities.description: The room where Harry is standing, described as having a merrily blazing fire and a cauldron simmering.

entities.name: copper pots and pans
entities.description: Cookware that has been burnished to a rosy glow, mentioned in the context of being cleaned for dinner.

entities.name: tabletop
entities.description: The wooden surface of the table, described as gleaming with light from the fire.

entities.name: goblets and plates
entities.description: Dinnerware that has been laid out for dinner, mentioned in the context of glinting in the light from the fire.

entities.name: fire
entities.description: A merrily blazing fire on which a cauldron is simmering, described as providing light for the room.

entities.name: cauldron
entities.description: A vessel that is simmering on the fire, mentioned in the context of being part of the dinner preparations.

entities.name: Kreacher
entities.description: The house-elf who comes hurrying toward Harry, dressed in a snowy-white towel and wearing Regulus's locket.

entities.name: Regulus's locket
entities.description: A piece of jewelry that is bouncing on Kreacher's thin chest, mentioned as being worn by the house-elf.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character who is standing in the kitchen, described as throwing down a newspaper and approaching Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is sitting at the table with Hermione, mentioned as asking what has happened.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is sitting at the table with Ron, mentioned as being present in the scene.

relationships.description: Kreacher comes hurrying toward Harry, indicating an approach relationship between the two entities.
Ron and Hermione are sitting at the table together, indicating a co-presence relationship between the two entities.
